com.intland.codebeamer.remoting.client

Class RemoteApiClientFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intland.codebeamer.remoting.client.RemoteApiClientFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRemoteApiClientFactory

    public class RemoteApiClientFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRemoteApiClientFactory
    Factory for remote-api on the client which automatically connects/reconnects through Hessian

      • connect

        public RemoteApi connect()
                  throws CodebeamerException
        Description copied from interface: IRemoteApiClientFactory
        Create/get the current connection. This should also do login and store the token to be available using the getToken() method.
